TitleSection: Blackwater Medical Centre is offering an Extended Hours service to all NHS patients.
CarouselText: People can book through their own surgery receptionist or via the 111 service. It is not a walk in centre, but patients have to pre-book.
The hours are Monday to Friday 6pm-8.30pm and Saturday and Sunday 8am-2pm
Blackwater Pharmacy is on site to dispense prescriptions for this service.

TitleSection: Dr Geramayeh has started an aesthetics clinic in the surgery
CarouselText: Click here to find out more.
We are open 100 hours every week, so why not come and pick up your prescriptions in the morning, or after dinner, when the car park is empty!
Why not order your repeat prescriptions, here, on the web site
Click here to order your repeat prescriptions.
If you get regular prescriptions the Electronic Prescription Service (EPS) may be able to save you time by saving you unnecessary trips to your GP.
EPS makes it possible for your prescriptions to be sent electronically to the pharmacy or dispenser of your choice.
This means, you will no longer have to collect a paper repeat prescription from your GP practice and instead the prescription will be delivered electronically to us, here, at the pharmacy.
To start this service just download this form, fill it in and hand it in at our pharmacy.
